indian.details: E-Visa required. Free Transit Tour (Touristanbul) ONLY if flying Turkish Airlines.

activities.title: Hagia Sophia
activities.description: Ancient mosque and architectural marvel. 1 hour taxi from airport (New IST is far).

activities.title: Grand Bazaar
activities.description: One of the largest covered markets in the world. Spices, carpets, lamps.

activities.title: Turkish Airlines Lounge
activities.description: Massive world-class lounge with sleeping suites, cinema, and chefs cooking Pide.

activities.title: YotelAir (Airside)
activities.description: Modern cabins inside the transit area. Book 'Airside' specifically.

activities.title: Galata Tower
activities.description: Medieval stone tower offering panoramic views of Istanbul.

activities.title: Blue Mosque
activities.description: Famous for its blue tiles. Located right next to Hagia Sophia.

activities.title: Baklava at Karakoy Gulluoglu
activities.description: The best Baklava in the world. Worth the detour.

activities.title: Old Bazaar Airport Shopping
activities.description: Airside luxury shopping styled like a bazaar.
